thread.title: Police fire rubber bullets at NMMU students
thread.title_full: Police fire rubber bullets at NMMU students | News24

author: news24.com
title: Police fire rubber bullets at NMMU students
text:
Port Elizabeth - Police fired rubber bullets at protesting Nelson Mandela Bay students on Wednesday, who took to the streets in solidarity with protesting students nationwide.
At least one student, identified as Noxolo Koko, was hit on the upper thigh.
Students throughout the country are protesting proposed fee hikes for 2016.
Police spokesperson, Captain Johan Rheeder, said police intervened early on Wednesday morning, after splinter groups of students blocked roads including Admiralty Way leading to the Nelson Mandela Metropolitan Universityâ€™s main campus, and started intimidating people in vehicles at around 07:00.
